FTX's Bankman-Fried Cannot Blame Lawyers in Opening Statement: Judge https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/10/01/ftxs-bankman-fried-cannot-blame-lawyers-in-opening-statement-judge/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines NIUHMFXQHJACJCG5C26HSDCBCQ Nikhilesh DeSam Bankman-Fried cannot blame FTX's lawyers for its collapse or operations in his opening statements, though he can still try and make a so-called "advice-of-counsel" defense later, the federal judge overseeing his case ruled Sunday. Sun, 01 Oct 2023 16:38:24 +0000 2023-10-01T16:40:51.142+00:00 PolicynewsSam Bankman-FriedSBF TrialFTX Collapsetop newsSam Bankman-Fried exiting a New York courthouse earlier this year.
